title: Comput-her baby
creator_credit: Dave Goldson, Neal Chastain and Pyramid Films
brief_description: A humorous but pointed satire on computer dating. Accompanied by ironically contrasting musical background, human voices reveal personal statistics for consumption by the computer. Compares cybernetic matching and old-fashioned computers, and questions the relationship between people and computers.
